tags: now please give robert a god damn oscar thank you
summary: Today marks the 11th anniversary of the first Iron Man movie, so I want to thank you to the crew that made this movie. To the...
body:
Today marks the 11th anniversary of the first Iron Man movie, so I want to thank you to the crew that made this movie. To the crew that unknowingly gave birth to the birth to the core and heart of the MCU.

Thank you for starting this legacy, allowing us to grow up physically and mentally alongside one of the best heroes of all time. Thank you for giving us not only the movie but something much more important than that.

It’s been 11 years and I’m happy that I got pulled into this ride.

So to Robert Downey Jr, to the rest of the actors and all the crew involved… Thank you for everything, we don’t know what would have been if it hadn’t been for you.

We’ll never forget the roots of how this amazing franchise started, from a box of scraps on a cave. We love you 3000.

tags: ...i don't remember anything about this movie apparently
summary: && everything i remember about || iron man  okay so it starts off and they’re in these little jeeps going somewhere and Tony...
body:
&& everything i remember about || iron man

  • okay so it starts off and they’re in these little jeeps going somewhere
  • and Tony starts up some banter with the soldierbois and soldierlady in the jeep with him, and one of the bois wants to do a picture so they’re getting ready for a selfie but then there’s an explosion
  • everyone’s dead so Tony scrambles out of the jeep and goes to hide but then a Stark Industries™ weapon goes off like right next to him and he looks down and there’s all this blood and then he passes out
  • he wakes up and there’s like a bag over his head and he’s on the news and people are saying how they captured Tony Stark…i actually don’t remember the specifics of this part at all but he’s in and out of consciousness or something
  • anyway
  • flash back to a speech being made about how great Tony is and he’s supposed to accept an award but he isn’t there so his creepy uncle accepts the award instead
  • because Tony’s actually elsewhere gambling which gets him in a bit of trouble with his buddy but he convinces his buddy to join in
  • he’s supposed to go somewhere else but he engages in some road rage and while he’s on a plane there are some girls and he and Rhodey i think have a talk
  • he goes to an event and gets accosted by a reporter but winds up flirting with her and they sleep together and she thinks that gives her a license to be rude to Pepper but then Pepper is rude back and goes to find Tony in the shmancy garage where he’s working on a car.
  • they talk about Pepperpepperpepper’s birthday and how she’s supposed to just buy her own present with Tony’s money and also she’s making sure he’s on time getting to a place
  • that’s actually when the road rage happens because he has to get to the airport
  • and then he gets to the thing where he’s supposed to present the thing and he’s very dramatic and show-off-y about whatever weapon and that’s when he gets in the jeep with the people from the beginning
  • the guy who captured him wants him to build some weapons
  • Tony wakes up from like heart surgery probably and yanks a tube out of his nose which is DISGUSTING but he winds up making friends with the doctor who tried to save him. unfortunately he’s still hooked up to a battery though my kitten is trying to sleep and the other kitten just keeps whapping him on the face how cute
  • so Tony’s pretty sure he’s just going to get murdered if he does what this guy wants so he and the doctor hatch a plot and start building…but not what the bad guy wants them to
  • Tony makes his first iron man suit and the escape starts but things don’t work out for the doctor and he gets died :(
  • but tony gets out and winds up out in the desert somewhere i think. the bad guy gets a gross burn on him
  • uhhh somehow T.Stark makes it home and he really wants a hamburger and there’s a press conference and he’s like yeah we’re not making weapons anymore and  everyone’s like what
  • his uncle really wants to know about the iron man suit i think
  • T.Stark makes a better version of the battery thingy and makes Pepper help him with it and she decides to keep the old one as a handy tool that’ll help them later
  • hm.
  • uhm.
  • Stark goes to a few more event type things and his uncle plots and there’s a part where the uncle just goes off and screeches “HE BUILT THAT THING IN A CAVE” annd i forgot th e rest of the line
  • Tony builds an actual iron man suit and flies around in it after some mayhem
  • and goes and fights some people and is like Rhodey that’s me in the suit
  • annd the uncle tries to kick Stark out of his own company or something and it has a vibe but then the uncle makes his own suit and he and Tony have a fight which of course tony wins
  • and then tony’s like I Am Iron Man

summary: Three Taps
title: Three Taps
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2LxNhG3

by Rabentochter

“My parents want to meet you,” Loki confessed into Tony’s pillow when he finally had caught his breath again and hoped his lover? Boyfriend? Understood him anyway. Even when it was mumbled in the dark red pillow.

“Why?” Tony sounded shocked and his eyes burned into Loki’s neck. “Why would they wish to see me?”

“Because,” Loki turned around, frown on his face, “we’ve been together for four months now and they just want to meet you.”

summary: Side Effects May Include (Tony Stark x Daughter)
title: Side Effects May Include (Tony Stark x Daughter)
body:
Side Effects May Include (Masterlist)

Like this series? Want to request something? Take a look at my Prompt List and send in a request! 

Part 16

Warnings: Foul language, mentions of rape and suicide

Word Count: 1,770



Tony waited at the front of the house, “I’m sorry, Mr. Stark,” Peter whispered as he stood next to Tony.

Tony sighed as the car came into view, he looked over at Steve and Sam, “see you guys at the hospital?” Steve gave Tony a small nod before getting into their car and driving off. Happy pulled the car next to Tony, “get in, kid,” Tony said as he opened the door.

The ride was silent, “look,” Tony began to say as he broke the silence, “you don’t have to be sorry. You did the one thing I’ve been wanting to do all day but I’ve held back on.”

“Should’ve let me finish him,” Peter uttered.

Tony chuckled as he shook his head, “finish him, do you know what you sound like?” he sighed, “as much as I would have liked to have seen you ‘finish him,’ I think it still would’ve been best if we settled this the legal way. Make him an example as to what happens when you mess with Tony Stark. An example as to what should happen if you…” Tony sighed, “rape young girls,” he whispered.

Peter had tears well up in his eyes, “how did she…” He sighed as he shook his head from the thoughts that were approaching.

Tony pinched the bridge of his nose, “she um, she took some pills,” He explained. “Luckily, Bucky found her in time.”

“Is she… Is she going to live?”

Tony let out a relieving sigh, “yes.” Peter simply nodded, “did you really mean it?” Peter looked over at Tony with a confused look, “when you said that you were in love with Olivia… did you mean it?”

“I didn’t mean to fall in love with her,” he whispered, “but the way she laughs just tugs my hear closer to her and the way she just looks me in the eye as she’s telling a story with such enthusiasm… I couldn’t help it.” Peter sighed, “I would look at her while she got her things ready to get out of the car and when she would glance at me I would quickly look away and act like I was staring at something. One time she caught me staring at her friend Jasmine, in reality, I was staring at the pole behind the girl, but from there on she thought I liked Jasmine so I took it and played along. It killed me to play along.”

Tony smiled, he hated the thought of his daughter growing up, falling-in-love, and getting married. But the way Peter spoke about Olivia, Tony saw a little of himself in the young man. It reminded him of how he fell in love with Andrea, Olivia’s mother, and even how he fell in love with Pepper. It all just happened. Unexpected.

That’s how love worked after all. Unexcitingly.

“Liv’s mother was my best friend in college,” Tony shared, “best friend for years and I understood why most of my relationships never worked, it was because I was in love with her.” Tony sighed, “what I’m trying to get at here is that… I’ve been there. But patience is key, kid.”

Happy pulled up to the hospital, Peter got off right after Tony. They walked in together, “anything?” Tony asked as soon as he walked into Olivia’s hospital room.

Pepper stood up and shook her head, “no, doctors say she probably won’t wake up until tomorrow.”

Peter slowly made his way over to Olivia’s bed, his heart ached to see the machines that were notifying everyone in the room that she was still breathing. He gently grabbed her hand, it was cold to the touch, “she probably won’t wake up until tomorrow, kid,” Tony said softly as he stood next to Peter.

“if it’s alright with you, I’d like to stay until visiting hours are over,” Peter stated.

Tony looked over at Pepper who had tears in her eyes, “you know it’s alright with me,” Tony said as he looked back over at Peter who continued to stare at Olivia.

Peter had kept his promise, he stayed until visiting hours were over. Happy took Peter home, as well as, Pepper who refused at first but after a small debate she finally caved in. The rest of the team had left a while back, mostly giving time for the family to be with Olivia, they would get their chance to see her when she woke up. They just wanted to make sure she was going to be okay.

Tony made himself comfortable on the hospital chair next to Olivia’s bed, he stared at his daughter laying in that hospital bed. Thinking back to when she was born:

“Alright, Mr. Stark, you ready?” The doctor announced as Andrea prepared herself for the last push.

Tony looked at Andrea in amazement, he kissed her temple, “you’re doing great,” he whispered.

“Fuck you,” she snarled.

He couldn’t help but chuckle, he deserved that, “yeah you did and look where it got us,” he said with a wink.

“Now’s not the time!” Andrea yelled.

“Count of three,” the doctor stated, “one, two, three, push!”

Andrea gave it her all, the sound of a baby crying filled the room. Tony’s heart leaped at the sound, “it’s a girl!” The doctor announced.

“It’s a girl!” Tony repeated as he kissed Andrea, “we have a girl!” Andrea cried tears of joy.

Tony quickly walked over and watched the nurses clean up his new baby girl, the nurse wrapped her in a blanket and gently handed her over to Tony. Tony gently held her as if his life depended on it, “oh my gosh,” he whispered, “I love you so much,” he stated. Tony looked up at Andrea who’s eyes were locked with her daughter in the arms of her father.

“She’s beautiful,” she whispered.

Tony placed another kiss on Andrea’s forehead, “the greatest gift you could ever give me,” he whispered.

Tony leaned over to his daughter and kissed her forehead, “my greatest gift,” he whispered, “I love you.”

Olivia’s eyes fluttered open, her breathing quickened, she wasn’t successful at her attempt. She let out a soft sob as she sat up on her bed.

Tony stirred in his sleep, opening his eyes to see his daughter awake, crying, “hey,” he whispered as he quickly made his way over to her, “shh,” he said as he laid on the bed with her, gently putting her head on his chest as he stroked her hair.

“I just want to die!” she exclaimed as she cried into her fathers chest.

“No, no,” Tony whispered as tears welled up in his eyes from hearing his own flesh and blood, his own daughter, yell out that she wanted to die. “You don’t mean that,” he said softly as he placed a kiss on top of her head.

“Yes, I do,” she sobbed.

Tony sighed and continued stroking her hair, in hopes it would calm her down, “I can’t lose you, Olivia,” he whispered, “I lost your mother, my best friend. You’re all I have left of her, of the time I spent with her. You mean the world to me, sweetheart and I don’t know what I would do without you,” Tony choked out, as tears made their way down his cheeks.

Olivia felt horrible for trying to take her life but felt like her only escape, “I’m sorry,” she sobbed, “I didn’t know what to do,” She knew her father must have seen the note.

“You should’ve told me about what happened with Bren,” he gave Olivia a gentle squeeze on the shoulder.

“I was scared,” she whispered as her sobs began to decline.

Tony shook his head, “scared of what? Me? My reaction?”

“Scared of what you might think of me, of what everyone might think of me.”

Tony grabbed his daughters face in a gentle way so that she would look at him, “Olivia Maria Stark, I would never think of you as anything other than a wonderful, strong, kind, beautiful… do you want me to keep going or are you going to stop me?”

Olivia chuckled, “I get it,” she whispered.

“What I’m trying to say is that I will never think bad of you for something you couldn’t control,” Tony gently stroked a strain of hair out of Olivia’s face, “I love you and I’m so sorry I wasn’t there to protect you.”

Olivia felt her eyes water up, she laid her head back onto her dad’s chest, “I wish you were,” she whispered, “but you didn’t know, neither of us did. We all thought nothing of it.”

Tony and Olivia sat in silence, eventually, a nurse came in and said there were guests waiting in the lobby. Tony left and came back with Pepper.

“Oh, Olivia!” Pepper exclaimed as tears welled up in her eyes, she ran over to the young girl that she thought so much as a daughter.

“I’m sorry, Pepper,” Olivia whispered as Pepper pulled the young girl into an embrace.

Pepper shook her head, “No, I’m sorry, I should’ve listened to you.” Olivia wanted to argue but she knew it was no use.

“I think it’s time for our family meeting,” Tony said as he took a seat by his daughter’s bed. Pepper did the same on the opposite end.

“I think we need to start the process of taking this to the court,” Pepper informed.

“Alright, well, is it too late for a rape kit?” Tony asked as he looked at Pepper and Liv.

“I don’t know, we’ll just have to as-“

“I already did one,” Olivia said, interrupting Pepper mid-sentence.

“You already did a rape kit?” Pepper asked as she gently held Olivia’s hand.

She gave Pepper a nod, “I wanted to make sure I was raped,” Olivia whispered, “the nurse said she’ll hold on to it just in case I ever want to use it as evidence.”

“So, then what are we waiting for? Let’s take this bastard to court!” Tony exclaimed as he walked over to his daughter’s hospital bed.

Olivia shook her head, “no,” she said softly.

“No? Olivia, sweetie, baby, he hurt you. He raped you! He caused you so many years of trauma and what does he get? To live life perfectly fine! We have to do something!” Tony explained as he grabbed his daughter’s other hand, gently giving it a squeeze, “I can’t stand around watching that kid live life knowing damn well he has done horrible things.”

Tony had a point, “you’re right,” she whispered.

“So, which nurse was this?” Pepper asked

“Her name is Daniela.”

Side Effects May Include (Masterlist)

Like this series? Want to request something? Take a look at my Prompt List and send in a request! 

Part 16

Warnings: Foul language, mentions of rape and suicide

Word Count: 1,770



Tony waited at the front of the house, “I’m sorry, Mr. Stark,” Peter whispered as he stood next to Tony.

Tony sighed as the car came into view, he looked over at Steve and Sam, “see you guys at the hospital?” Steve gave Tony a small nod before getting into their car and driving off. Happy pulled the car next to Tony, “get in, kid,” Tony said as he opened the door.

The ride was silent, “look,” Tony began to say as he broke the silence, “you don’t have to be sorry. You did the one thing I’ve been wanting to do all day but I’ve held back on.”

“Should’ve let me finish him,” Peter uttered.

Tony chuckled as he shook his head, “finish him, do you know what you sound like?” he sighed, “as much as I would have liked to have seen you ‘finish him,’ I think it still would’ve been best if we settled this the legal way. Make him an example as to what happens when you mess with Tony Stark. An example as to what should happen if you…” Tony sighed, “rape young girls,” he whispered.

Peter had tears well up in his eyes, “how did she…” He sighed as he shook his head from the thoughts that were approaching.

Tony pinched the bridge of his nose, “she um, she took some pills,” He explained. “Luckily, Bucky found her in time.”

“Is she… Is she going to live?”

Tony let out a relieving sigh, “yes.” Peter simply nodded, “did you really mean it?” Peter looked over at Tony with a confused look, “when you said that you were in love with Olivia… did you mean it?”

“I didn’t mean to fall in love with her,” he whispered, “but the way she laughs just tugs my hear closer to her and the way she just looks me in the eye as she’s telling a story with such enthusiasm… I couldn’t help it.” Peter sighed, “I would look at her while she got her things ready to get out of the car and when she would glance at me I would quickly look away and act like I was staring at something. One time she caught me staring at her friend Jasmine, in reality, I was staring at the pole behind the girl, but from there on she thought I liked Jasmine so I took it and played along. It killed me to play along.”

Tony smiled, he hated the thought of his daughter growing up, falling-in-love, and getting married. But the way Peter spoke about Olivia, Tony saw a little of himself in the young man. It reminded him of how he fell in love with Andrea, Olivia’s mother, and even how he fell in love with Pepper. It all just happened. Unexpected.

That’s how love worked after all. Unexcitingly.

“Liv’s mother was my best friend in college,” Tony shared, “best friend for years and I understood why most of my relationships never worked, it was because I was in love with her.” Tony sighed, “what I’m trying to get at here is that… I’ve been there. But patience is key, kid.”

Happy pulled up to the hospital, Peter got off right after Tony. They walked in together, “anything?” Tony asked as soon as he walked into Olivia’s hospital room.

Pepper stood up and shook her head, “no, doctors say she probably won’t wake up until tomorrow.”

Peter slowly made his way over to Olivia’s bed, his heart ached to see the machines that were notifying everyone in the room that she was still breathing. He gently grabbed her hand, it was cold to the touch, “she probably won’t wake up until tomorrow, kid,” Tony said softly as he stood next to Peter.

“if it’s alright with you, I’d like to stay until visiting hours are over,” Peter stated.

Tony looked over at Pepper who had tears in her eyes, “you know it’s alright with me,” Tony said as he looked back over at Peter who continued to stare at Olivia.

Peter had kept his promise, he stayed until visiting hours were over. Happy took Peter home, as well as, Pepper who refused at first but after a small debate she finally caved in. The rest of the team had left a while back, mostly giving time for the family to be with Olivia, they would get their chance to see her when she woke up. They just wanted to make sure she was going to be okay.

Tony made himself comfortable on the hospital chair next to Olivia’s bed, he stared at his daughter laying in that hospital bed. Thinking back to when she was born:

“Alright, Mr. Stark, you ready?” The doctor announced as Andrea prepared herself for the last push.

Tony looked at Andrea in amazement, he kissed her temple, “you’re doing great,” he whispered.

“Fuck you,” she snarled.

He couldn’t help but chuckle, he deserved that, “yeah you did and look where it got us,” he said with a wink.

“Now’s not the time!” Andrea yelled.

“Count of three,” the doctor stated, “one, two, three, push!”

Andrea gave it her all, the sound of a baby crying filled the room. Tony’s heart leaped at the sound, “it’s a girl!” The doctor announced.

“It’s a girl!” Tony repeated as he kissed Andrea, “we have a girl!” Andrea cried tears of joy.

Tony quickly walked over and watched the nurses clean up his new baby girl, the nurse wrapped her in a blanket and gently handed her over to Tony. Tony gently held her as if his life depended on it, “oh my gosh,” he whispered, “I love you so much,” he stated. Tony looked up at Andrea who’s eyes were locked with her daughter in the arms of her father.

“She’s beautiful,” she whispered.

Tony placed another kiss on Andrea’s forehead, “the greatest gift you could ever give me,” he whispered.

Tony leaned over to his daughter and kissed her forehead, “my greatest gift,” he whispered, “I love you.”

~~

Olivia’s eyes fluttered open, her breathing quickened, she wasn’t successful at her attempt. She let out a soft sob as she sat up on her bed.

Tony stirred in his sleep, opening his eyes to see his daughter awake, crying, “hey,” he whispered as he quickly made his way over to her, “shh,” he said as he laid on the bed with her, gently putting her head on his chest as he stroked her hair.

“I just want to die!” she exclaimed as she cried into her fathers chest.

“No, no,” Tony whispered as tears welled up in his eyes from hearing his own flesh and blood, his own daughter, yell out that she wanted to die. “You don’t mean that,” he said softly as he placed a kiss on top of her head.

“Yes, I do,” she sobbed.

Tony sighed and continued stroking her hair, in hopes it would calm her down, “I can’t lose you, Olivia,” he whispered, “I lost your mother, my best friend. You’re all I have left of her, of the time I spent with her. You mean the world to me, sweetheart and I don’t know what I would do without you,” Tony choked out, as tears made their way down his cheeks.

Olivia felt horrible for trying to take her life but felt like her only escape, “I’m sorry,” she sobbed, “I didn’t know what to do,” She knew her father must have seen the note.

“You should’ve told me about what happened with Bren,” he gave Olivia a gentle squeeze on the shoulder.

“I was scared,” she whispered as her sobs began to decline.

Tony shook his head, “scared of what? Me? My reaction?”

“Scared of what you might think of me, of what everyone might think of me.”

Tony grabbed his daughters face in a gentle way so that she would look at him, “Olivia Maria Stark, I would never think of you as anything other than a wonderful, strong, kind, beautiful… do you want me to keep going or are you going to stop me?”

Olivia chuckled, “I get it,” she whispered.

“What I’m trying to say is that I will never think bad of you for something you couldn’t control,” Tony gently stroked a strain of hair out of Olivia’s face, “I love you and I’m so sorry I wasn’t there to protect you.”

Olivia felt her eyes water up, she laid her head back onto her dad’s chest, “I wish you were,” she whispered, “but you didn’t know, neither of us did. We all thought nothing of it.”

Tony and Olivia sat in silence, eventually, a nurse came in and said there were guests waiting in the lobby. Tony left and came back with Pepper.

“Oh, Olivia!” Pepper exclaimed as tears welled up in her eyes, she ran over to the young girl that she thought so much as a daughter.

“I’m sorry, Pepper,” Olivia whispered as Pepper pulled the young girl into an embrace.

Pepper shook her head, “No, I’m sorry, I should’ve listened to you.” Olivia wanted to argue but she knew it was no use.

“I think it’s time for our family meeting,” Tony said as he took a seat by his daughter’s bed. Pepper did the same on the opposite end.

“I think we need to start the process of taking this to the court,” Pepper informed.

“Alright, well, is it too late for a rape kit?” Tony asked as he looked at Pepper and Liv.

“I don’t know, we’ll just have to as-“

“I already did one,” Olivia said, interrupting Pepper mid-sentence.

“You already did a rape kit?” Pepper asked as she gently held Olivia’s hand.

She gave Pepper a nod, “I wanted to make sure I was raped,” Olivia whispered, “the nurse said she’ll hold on to it just in case I ever want to use it as evidence.”

“So, then what are we waiting for? Let’s take this bastard to court!” Tony exclaimed as he walked over to his daughter’s hospital bed.

Olivia shook her head, “no,” she said softly.

“No? Olivia, sweetie, baby, he hurt you. He raped you! He caused you so many years of trauma and what does he get? To live life perfectly fine! We have to do something!” Tony explained as he grabbed his daughter’s other hand, gently giving it a squeeze, “I can’t stand around watching that kid live life knowing damn well he has done horrible things.”

Tony had a point, “you’re right,” she whispered.

“So, which nurse was this?” Pepper asked

“Her name is Daniela.”

summary: They just dont know you
body:
They just dont know you

Bucky Barnes x reader

Dad!Tony Stark x reader

A/N: I’m on a roll tonight man!! Based on the song ‘They just dont know you’ by Little Mix! Feel free to request anything xxxx

***************

Daddy doesn’t think that you’ll be good enough for me

Mama says be careful ‘cause he’ll break your heart in three

They don’t walk in my shoes

They ain’t being kissed by you


The frontdoor sounded louder than ever as I silently tried to close it “Damnit” I cursed quietly as the door creaked. When it finally closed I tiptoed my way to the kitchen for a bottle of water before going to bed. But when I turned on the light in the kitchen I was taken by surprise when I saw my dad standing there, just sipping milk through a straw “Where have you been” he said, trying not to sound worried “Out” I answered quickly, avoiding his glance “Out?” He repeated and I nodded “Yeah, with Steve” I said, walking around the kitchen isle to the fridge “Funny” my dad laughed and I looked at him “Because Steve just called, asking me if I knew where Bucky was” my heart dropped as I felt my heart beating faster “Thats strange, haven’t seen him either. Goodnight dad” I quickly grabbed a water bottle from the fridge and practically ran out of the kitchen “He’ll hurt you” I stopped walking and turned around to face my dad “What?” “Look, Y/N. I love you but…” “But what dad?” He sighed and rubbed his eyes before looking at me “He’s not good enough for you” “Why would you say that” I crossed my arms “Because it’s true Y/N. He’s bad news, I talked to Pepper about it… she agrees, says he’ll break your heart in three” I scoffed, turning around and ignoring my father’s calls and leaving the house once again.


Tell me, tell me you won’t break my heart

You won’t tear my world apart

That you’ll be there when I need

'Cause I wanna tell them

They just don’t know you


Knocking three times I waited for an answer. I heard footsteps coming from inside the apartment and sighed in relief when he finally opened the door for me. Before Bucky could say anything I fell into his arms as he let out an ‘oomph’ sound from the sudden impact from my body to his. He waited for a second before putting his arms around me as well, pulling me inside the appartement. “Is Steve home?” I asked, still holding him close to me “No” I pulled back from the hug and looked at him “good” he pushed my hair out of my face and kept his hands on my cheeks “Wanna talk about it?” I stared at him for a second before letting out a deep breath “Tell me you wont break my heart” he looked taken back and shook his head “Y/N… I could never” I simply nodded and let my head fall on his chest again. “I love you” he said, kissing my head and I smiled “I love you too”


It’s funny 'cause at times it feels like us against the world

They treat you like a criminal but I’ll still be your girl

I’d ride or die with you

Walk the line if you asked me to


The sun was shining on both of our faces as we enjoyed our cup of coffee in the cafe right outside of Bucky’s building. Today was the hottest day of the year so far and God I was melting. I looked over at Bucky who wore a white t-shirt, his metal arm exposed. “Wanna order lunch now?” I asked and he nodded. I looked for a menu and saw one on the table next to us “Excuse me, can I have the menu please” I kindly asked the woman next to me, she turned her head to look at me and her glance fell on Bucky’s arm. I could see the sudden fear in her eyes as she shakingly handed me the menu. I opened it and started scanning the menu “Oh babe they have steak t-“ I suddenly heard a chair move and looked up to see Bucky leave “Babe?” I questioned and quickly stood up, following him “Bucky!” I yelled after him but he just kept walking. As I caught up to him I grabbed his arm and turned him around “Hey, what’s wrong?” “3 years. It took the world 3 years to accept me.. or so I thought they did” I looked at him in confusion before it clicked. The woman in the cafe. He must have noticed how she looked at his metal arm “You know maybe Tony’s right. I’m not good enough for you” he said and I shook my head, placing my hands on his chest “Baby, look at me. I’m your girl. I’ll always be your girl. I dont give a damn about what people think of us. I love you, nothing can change that” he looked at me and smiled, a little taken back by my sudden speech “Your my girl” he smiled and I nodded “I’m your girl”


You don’t know about our love

You choose what you see

'Cause if you felt the way we love

You’d just let it be


It was one of my dad’s fancy parties and everyone was there. And by everyone I mean… everyone. It seemed as if this time he had invited the whole city of New York to the party and to be honest, I wasn’t totally comfortable with this many people in my home. I looked down to all the people in my living room and couldn’t help but smile as I spotted Bucky and Steve laughing at something that Sam had said.

“You’re really not gonna follow my advice are you” I turned around to see my dad “When do you ever follow mine?” I shot back and he chuckled “Touché” he handed me a glass of expensive champagne and I gladly accepted it, taking a sip “Did you atleast think about what I said?” “Dad, have you ever taken a minute of your day to even talk to him? I dont believe you have ever said more than 2 words to him. You don’t know him. You dont know what he’s like, how he treats me, how he loves me. You dont know our love, because you’re not giving it a chance.” My dad looked at to where Bucky was standing and sighed “Alright, I’ll try. But if he hurts you I swear I-“ I cut him off as I hugged him “Thank you dad”


You don’t know about the times

When it’s just him and me

'Cause if you felt the way we love

You’d just let it be


Walking across the busy room I focused on Bucky and made my way towards him. He saw me coming and a big smile appeared on his face “Hey my love” he put his free hand around my shoulder and kissed my cheek before taking a sip from his beer. “You doing okay?” I asked him and he nodded “Little too busy for me but I’m good now that you’re here” I smiled at his comment and gently rubbed his cheek “My dad said he’d try” the statement obviously surprised him as he choked on his drink “what?” He asked and I laughed, wiping away the spilled beer from his lips “I talked to him, he’s gonna try to atleast say ‘hi’ to you” he put down his beer and grabbed my shoulders “Do you think he’ll finally bless me to ask you to marry me” I laughed and grabbed his cheeks “Let’s first survive our first dinner as a family” “Family… that had a nice ring to it” I gently kissed his lips and smiled “Well get used to it, because that’s what we are”.

Tony was watching from a far as his daughter gently kissed the man of her dreams. His heart ached at the sight. His daughter didn’t need him anymore like she used to. She didn’t need him to protect her anymore. No, that was all Bucky’s job now. He knew a father’s love could never die, but somehow he felt as if she wasn’t daddy’s little girl anymore. Tony stared at Bucky who gave his daughter the most loving look a man could give and that’s when he knew. Thats when he knew he would try, because damn… Bucky loved Y/N with all his heart.

As I caught up to him I grabbed his arm and turned him around “Hey, what’s wrong?” “3 years. It took the world 3 years to accept me.. or so I thought they did” I looked at him in confusion before it clicked. The woman in the cafe. He must have noticed how she looked at his metal arm “You know maybe Tony’s right. I’m not good enough for you” he said and I shook my head, placing my hands on his chest “Baby, look at me. I’m your girl. I’ll always be your girl. I dont give a damn about what people think of us. I love you, nothing can change that” he looked at me and smiled, a little taken back by my sudden speech “Your my girl” he smiled and I nodded “I’m your girl”


You don’t know about our love

You choose what you see

'Cause if you felt the way we love

You’d just let it be


It was one of my dad’s fancy parties and everyone was there. And by everyone I mean… everyone. It seemed as if this time he had invited the whole city of New York to the party and to be honest, I wasn’t totally comfortable with this many people in my home. I looked down to all the people in my living room and couldn’t help but smile as I spotted Bucky and Steve laughing at something that Sam had said.

“You’re really not gonna follow my advice are you” I turned around to see my dad “When do you ever follow mine?” I shot back and he chuckled “Touché” he handed me a glass of expensive champagne and I gladly accepted it, taking a sip “Did you atleast think about what I said?” “Dad, have you ever taken a minute of your day to even talk to him? I dont believe you have ever said more than 2 words to him. You don’t know him. You dont know what he’s like, how he treats me, how he loves me. You dont know our love, because you’re not giving it a chance.” My dad looked at to where Bucky was standing and sighed “Alright, I’ll try. But if he hurts you I swear I-“ I cut him off as I hugged him “Thank you dad”


You don’t know about the times

When it’s just him and me

'Cause if you felt the way we love

You’d just let it be


Walking across the busy room I focused on Bucky and made my way towards him. He saw me coming and a big smile appeared on his face “Hey my love” he put his free hand around my shoulder and kissed my cheek before taking a sip from his beer. “You doing okay?” I asked him and he nodded “Little too busy for me but I’m good now that you’re here” I smiled at his comment and gently rubbed his cheek “My dad said he’d try” the statement obviously surprised him as he choked on his drink “what?” He asked and I laughed, wiping away the spilled beer from his lips “I talked to him, he’s gonna try to atleast say ‘hi’ to you” he put down his beer and grabbed my shoulders “Do you think he’ll finally bless me to ask you to marry me” I laughed and grabbed his cheeks “Let’s first survive our first dinner as a family” “Family… that had a nice ring to it” I gently kissed his lips and smiled “Well get used to it, because that’s what we are”.

Tony was watching from a far as his daughter gently kissed the man of her dreams. His heart ached at the sight. His daughter didn’t need him anymore like she used to. She didn’t need him to protect her anymore. No, that was all Bucky’s job now. He knew a father’s love could never die, but somehow he felt as if she wasn’t daddy’s little girl anymore. Tony stared at Bucky who gave his daughter the most loving look a man could give and that’s when he knew. Thats when he knew he would try, because damn… Bucky loved Y/N with all his heart.
